00090 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00091  * Classes
00092  */

00099 class ignore_missing_arguments_scope
00100     : private mismatched_arguments_scope_base // ISA is not important
00101 {
00102 public: // Member Types
00104     typedef mismatched_arguments_scope_base     parent_class_type;
00106     typedef ignore_missing_arguments_scope      class_type;
00107 
00108 public: // Construction
00114     ignore_missing_arguments_scope()
00115         : parent_class_type(class_type::handler, get_this_())
00116     {}
00123     ~ignore_missing_arguments_scope() throw()
00124     {}
00125 private:
00126     ignore_missing_arguments_scope(class_type const&);
00127     class_type& operator =(class_type const&);
00128 
00129 private: // Implementation
00130     void* get_this_() throw()
00131     {
00132         return this;
00133     }
00134 
00135     static int FASTFORMAT_CALLCONV handler(
00136         void*                   param
00137     ,   ff_replacement_code_t   code
00138     ,   size_t                  numParameters
00139     ,   int                     parameterIndex
00140     ,   ff_string_slice_t*      slice
00141     ,   void*                   reserved0
00142     ,   size_t                  reserved1
00143     ,   void*                   reserved2
00144     )
00145     {
00146         class_type* pThis = static_cast<class_type*>(param);
00147 
00148         if(FF_REPLACEMENTCODE_MISSING_ARGUMENT == code)
00149         {
00150             return +1; // Ignore unreferenced arguments
00151         }
00152         else
00153         {
00154             return pThis->parent_class_type::handle_default(param, code, numParameters, parameterIndex, slice, reserved0, reserved1, reserved2);
00155         }
00156     }
00157 };
00158
